website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a Nespresso that's capable of making numerous drinks with a modern design and impressive functions, this one is the best.
pros: A sleek, top-of-the line model that does it all
Features include milk frother and compact brewing compartment
It also preheats fast (25 seconds or less)
cons: A bit pricier than other Nespresso machines, but it's the best the brand has to offer

customer_reviews.title: Square Trade Warranty disappoints ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Nespresso by Breville for almost 6 months and it leaks water. I bought a Square Trade Warranty and what a joke! I filled out the information and submitted it and within seconds I received an email saying it was denied because the problem was due to my negligence. Seconds later I received another one directing me to call a number for assistance. This situation is pretty cut and dried. A machine shouldn’t leak water! Also, a Nespresso Citiz should last more than 6 months! Save your money when it comes to Square Trade!!

customer_reviews.title: Beware of common defect!

product_meta.title: Breville-Nespresso USA BEC680SIL1BUC1 CitiZ and Milk Espresso Machine, Bundle - Silver
product_meta.description:
Color:Bundle - SilverUpdated retro-modern design, with an integrated milk frother. With its new design, CitiZ & milk continues to please both Nespresso coffee drinkers and design lovers, adding a touch of elegance to coffee rituals around the globe. The user-friendly features include two programmable buttons with automatic flow-stop for Espresso and Lungo coffee preparations, as well as a removable drip tray for taller glass recipes. Fitted with an Aeroccino, optimized in space, which prepares perfect milk froth and hot milk automatically, Citiz & milk allows you to create an endless number of milk-based coffee recipes at the touch of a button. 
The 19 bar high-performance pump offers barista-style coffee every time, perfectly extracting the delicate flavor and premium aromas of each coffee capsule during the brewing process and creating an incomparably dense and unctuous crema. The fast heat-up system reaches the ideal temperature in just 25 seconds, while the automatic energy-saving function switches the machine off after 9 minutes of inactivity, making your life easier. Keeping its iconic lines and premium finish, the range of intuitive and user-friendly Citiz machines embodies the expertise of Nespresso to suit all coffee-drinking preferences. Each machine includes a welcome set with a range of Nespresso capsules with unique aroma profiles.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: CitiZ's new look continues to please both Nespresso coffee and espresso drinkers and design lovers, adding a touch of elegance to coffee rituals.
SMART POWER: Nespresso's unique 19 bar extraction system along with an automatic standby mode to reduce energy consumption.

VERSATILITY: The folding cup tray accommodates taller single serve coffee or espresso cups. Brew different single serve coffee cup sizes at the touch of a button depending on your coffee needs - Espresso (1.35 oz) or Lungo (5 oz). Pour over ice to create your favorite iced coffee and iced latte drinks. Removable Nespresso capsule container, drip tray and water tank (34 oz.) for quick and simple cleaning.
BUNDLE: The Aeroccino 3 milk frother is included to create the perfect finish to your single serve coffee beverages such as cappuccino or latte.
COMPLIMENTARY GIFT: Each machine includes a Nespresso Original capsule welcome kit with a range of 14 capsules with unique aroma profiles.
